outline.title: DOZIER HOLDINGS GROUP, LLC
outline.summary: Building Tomorrow's Empire Today - A Diversified Holdings Company
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_CMai7m_image.png - Image 24 is the DHG Crab Shield logo, which is appropriate for the overall holding company title slide.

outline.title: One Empire. Twelve Companies. Unlimited Potential.
outline.summary: Technology, Real Estate, Trading divisions with $500B+ TAM
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/2ab9dfe08c10c06f2b68440e4ca21377.JPG - Image 11 shows a modern building with solar panels, representing the Technology and Real Estate divisions and the concept of "Building Tomorrow's Empire Today."

outline.title: The Founders
outline.summary: Chad A. Dozier Sr., Glenn Tse, Jimmy Boyd, Andrew Kustes
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/IMG_8735.jpeg - Image 10 is a group photo that appears to be the Dozier family/group, which is suitable for the "Leadership Team" slide, assuming the founders are part of this group.

outline.title: 12 Companies. 4 Divisions. 1 Vision.
outline.summary: Technology, Real Estate, Dining, Trading divisions overview
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/0300a5bcb3d16c0774bc50adb9b43fa3.JPG; /home/ubuntu/upload/e714d3aabf18804b3062caaa337ba198.JPG; /home/ubuntu/upload/e2b038eadf2b3b7e50454f21ea54f20d.JPG; /home/ubuntu/upload/a0e6edb55f1edf8a06785212c1217c05.JPG - Images 16-22 are various shots of a data center (exterior, power panels, server racks, control room, cooling pipes, cooling towers), which directly illustrate the core business of VC Data Centers. Using multiple images provides a comprehensive view of the infrastructure.

outline.title: Flexible Investment Options
outline.summary: Full Empire, Division, or Individual Company investment options
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/cBsWGg2QWgBb.jpg - Image 25 is a professional handshake overlayed with a city scape, symbolizing investment, partnership, and growth, which is perfect for the "Investment Opportunity" slide.

outline.title: Ready to Build the Future?
outline.summary: Contact information and call to action
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/VA9a09mMaT2g.jpg - Image 26 is a double exposure of a handshake and financial data, symbolizing a successful investment partnership, ideal for the final contact slide which is an invitation to invest.
